de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.components.processor.runtime
Interface ITMQLRuntime

All Known Implementing Classes:
TmqlRuntime, TmqlRuntime2007, TmqlRuntimeImpl
public interface ITMQLRuntime

Core component of the processing model of the TMQL4J engine. The runtime encapsulate the whole TMQL process chain and store internal states and results. An instance of ITMQLRuntime is used as public interface to Java applications using the TMQL engine.

Author:
Sven Krosse

Method Detail

run

void run(IQuery query)
         throws TMQLRuntimeException
Execution method of the TMQL runtime.

Method starts the execution of the encapsulated processing chain and store the total execution time.

Parameters:
query - the query to execute
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if execution fails

run

IQuery run(org.tmapi.core.TopicMap topicMap,
           java.lang.String query)
           throws TMQLRuntimeException
Execution method of the TMQL runtime.

Method starts the execution of the encapsulated processing chain and store the total execution time.

The runtime will be create a IQuery representation by calling QueryFactory#buildQuery(String) and transform the given query to a TMQL query.

Parameters:
topicMap - the topicMap
query - the query to execute
Returns:
the create query
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if execution fails

the reference of the language context

                                                throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
Method get access to the internal extension point manager

Returns:
the reference
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - thrown if the extension mechanism is not supported by the current TMQL runtime

isExtensionMechanismSupported

boolean isExtensionMechanismSupported()
Returns a boolean value represent the support of extension mechanisms of this TMQL runtime.

Returns:
true if the runtime supports extensions, false otherwise.
